mapper.select: SELECT ba.id, ba.btitle, ba.skin, ba.category, ba.listcount, ba.pagecount, ba.lgrade, ba.vgrade, ba.rgrade, ba.fgrade, ba.fdgrade, ba.cgrade, ba.regrade, ba.upload, ba.filesize, ba.allfilesize, ba.thimgsize, ba.filechar, ba.sec, COUNT(b.id) AS bbsCount FROM board_admin ba LEFT JOIN board b ON ba.id = b.bbsid GROUP BY ba.id ORDER BY ba.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_admin SET btitle = #{btitle}, skin = #{skin}, category = #{category}, listcount = #{listcount}, pagecount = #{pagecount}, lgrade = #{lgrade}, vgrade = #{vgrade}, rgrade = #{rgrade}, fgrade = #{fgrade}, cgrade = #{cgrade}, regrade = #{regrade}, upload = #{upload}, filesize = #{filesize}, allfilesize = #{allfilesize}, thimgsize = #{thimgsize}, filechar = #{filechar}, sec = #{sec} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE bid=#{id} order by category_num
